com.example.spoon.ordering.tests

Class SpoonInstrumentationTestRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Instrumentation
      • android.test.InstrumentationTestRunner
        • com.example.spoon.ordering.tests.SpoonInstrumentationTestRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.test.TestSuiteProvider

    public class SpoonInstrumentationTestRunner
extends android.test.InstrumentationTestRunner
    Test runner which disables the keyguard and wake up the screen during execution. Requires test application have android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD permission declared.
